mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE status = 'available' AND CURRENT_TIME BETWEEN open_time AND close_time ORDER BY location, name
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE location = #{location} ORDER BY name
SELECT r.name, COUNT(res.id) as value FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN seats s ON r.id = s.room_id LEFT JOIN reservations res ON s.id = res.seat_id GROUP BY r.id, r.name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT r.name as room_name, HOUR(res.reservation_in_time) as hour, COUNT(res.id) as count FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN seats s ON r.id = s.room_id LEFT JOIN reservations res ON s.id = res.seat_id WHERE res.reservation_in_time IS NOT NULL AND res.reservation_in_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY r.id, r.name, HOUR(res.reservation_in_time) ORDER BY r.name, hour
